Package game.adventuregame.model

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.adventuregame.model.Location
  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    Models locations for the game.

    A Location has a name, its description, direction and name of the neighbours, list of items in the location.

    Author:
    Shankar Ammai
    See Also:
    Item

    • Constructor Detail

      • Location

        public Location​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String description)
        Creates a new location with given name and description.

        Newly created location will not have any neighbours and items.

        Parameters:
        name - name of the location.
        description - Description of the location.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the location
        Returns:
        The name of the location.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the description of the location.
        Returns:
        The description of the location

      • addNeighbour

        public void addNeighbour​(java.lang.String direction,
                         Location neighbour)
        Adds a neighbour to a location providing direction and neighbour

        User Should provide direction as String and neighbour as location, Neighbour is also another location.

        Parameters:
        direction - Direction to the neighbour
        neighbour - Neighbour of the location, Neighbour is location as well.

      • getNeighbour

        public Location getNeighbour​(java.lang.String direction)
        Returns neighbour providing the direction to the neighbour.
        Parameters:
        direction - Direction to the neighbour
        Returns:
        neighbour, neighbour is another location as well.

      • getAllDirections

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getAllDirections()
        Returns List of all directions that the location has neighbours to.
        Returns:
        directions All the Direction which has neighbours to it.

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<Item> getItems()
        Returns all the items in the location.
        Returns:
        All the items in the location.

      • addItem

        public void addItem​(Item item)
        Adds a given item to the location.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to be added to the location.

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem​(Item item)
        Checks if the item is in the location or not .
        Parameters:
        item - Item to check if it is in the location.
        Returns:
        If the item is present in the location or not.

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem​(Item item)
        Removes a item from a location.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to be removed from a location.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the item to be removed is not in that location.
